snippet: They might not be the president, but they’ve played one (or at least his press secretary) on TV. Here they decree their summer-feast recommendations.
abstract: Actors who have played a president or a government official on television offer their recommendations for a summer feast.
lead_paragraph: They might not be the president, but they’ve played one (or at least his press secretary) on TV. Here they decree their summer-feast recommendations.

headline.main: Commanders in Chef: Recipes From TV Presidents
